greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(i,j=1..i) read by rows which contain the naturally ordered divisors-or-ones of the row number i.
comment: Replace 0 with 1 in A127093. - _Omar E. Pol_, Apr 21 2019
link: I. V. Serov, Rows n = 1..131 of triangle, flattened
mathematica: Table[Map[If[Mod[n, #] == 0, #, 1] &, Range@ n], {n, 13}] // Flatten (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Apr 23 2019 *)
program: (PARI) row(n) = vector(n, k, if ((n % k) == 0, k, 1)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Apr 21 2019
results.author: _I. V. Serov_, Apr 20 2019
